original_title: Hawkwind - Warrior On The Edge Of Time
overview: This is an NTSC region Free DVD featuring a new surround & stereo mixes of the classic Hawkwind Album, Warrior On The Edge Of Time.  Recorded in 1975, the album is a ground-breaking classic of Hawkwindâ€™s career. Featuring a line-up of DAVE BROCK, NIK TURNER, LEMMY, SIMON HOUSE, SIMON KING & ALAN POWELL, the album is arguably one of the finest rock albums of the mid-1970s.
tagline: Limited Video, this is the surround sound version of the album
title: Hawkwind - Warrior On The Edge Of Time
